name: Spooky Fight
description:
Try to defeat the ghost in this short fight! You have only 20 seconds, so be a brave skeleton!

#This is my first game after taking a break from game development for almost a year, it's not perfect but I like it and I hope you do too (at least at some point)#

Controls:

ZPunch LeftXPunch RightNDodge LeftMDodge Right
